name: Oracle Enterprise Database Deployment on a Single VM - VMware vSphere
description: This template deploys Oracle Enterprise Database V12c with a raw database on a Linux virtual machine.

metadata.displayName: Oracle Enterprise Database Deployment on a Single VM
metadata.longDescription: This template deploys Oracle Enterprise Database V12c with a raw database on a Linux virtual machine.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description:
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1 virtual machine:
Oracle DB
odb instance 1, 1 database

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Detailed system requirements for Oracle Database V12c - https://docs.oracle.com/en/database
